testcase.name: User Login with Valid Credentials
testcase.system-out: Given user is on application home page......................................passed When application page title is FREE CRM.....................................passed Then user clicks START HERE button..........................................passed Then user enters username and password......................................passed Then user clicks Login button...............................................passed And navigates to user profile page..........................................passed

testcase.name: User Login with Valid Credentials and Create New Deal
